mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chat (sender_id, receiver_id, message) VALUES (#{senderId}, #{receiverId}, #{message})
mapper.select: SELECT chat_id, sender_id, receiver_id, message, regdate FROM chat WHERE sender_id = #{senderId} ORDER BY regdate ASC
SELECT chat_id, sender_id, receiver_id, message, regdate FROM chat WHERE receiver_id = #{receiverId} ORDER BY regdate ASC

SELECT chat_id, sender_id, receiver_id, message, regdate FROM chat WHERE (sender_id = #{userId1} AND receiver_id = #{userId2}) OR (sender_id = #{userId2} AND receiver_id = #{userId1}) ORDER BY regdate ASC
SELECT chat_id, sender_id, receiver_id, message, regdate FROM chat ORDER BY regdate DESC
